H0.text: What is the generic name for a drug that reduces fever. Antifebrin

H1.text: What is the generic name for a drug that reduces fever. Pyrostat

H2.text: What is the generic name for a drug that reduces fever. Thermolysin

H3.text: What is the generic name for a drug that reduces fever. ntipyretic

A4.text: Medications that lower fevers are called antipyretics.

A5.text: Paracetamol is used for reducing fever.

A6.text: Ibuprofen is used primarily to treat fever (including post-vaccination fever).

A7.text: Ibuprofen is used primarily to treat fever (including post-vaccination fever), mild to moderate pain (including pain relief after surgery), painful menstruation, osteoarthritis, dental pain, headaches, and pain from kidney stones.
